function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of concrete plan for office redesign","Impact":"Increased risk of inability to adapt to long-term safety and health requirements","Mitigation":"Developing a comprehensive plan for office redesign with a focus on long-term safety and health requirements","Technologies":"Facility management software, space planning tools","People":"Employees, visitors to the workplace","Owner":"Facilities management team or CRE management team"},{"Description":"Reduction in office space provision","Impact":"Potential overcrowding in the remaining office space, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Careful planning of office space utilization and flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Space utilization software, remote work tools","People":"Employees, visitors to the workplace","Owner":"Facilities management team or CRE management team"},{"Description":"Shift towards soft renovation instead of major refurbishment projects","Impact":"Reduced improvement in building safety and health standards, potentially leading to increased disease transmission risk","Mitigation":"Balancing soft renovation with essential building service system refurbishment","Technologies":"Building management systems, health and safety monitoring tools","People":"Construction and maintenance teams, employees","Owner":"Facilities management team or CRE management team"}]}
